attributes.action: Provide financial assistance packages to UK airlines to save thousands of jobs.
attributes.additional_details: It will save thousands of jobs not only in aviation, but within third party providers such as Airbus in Wales, Rolls Royce, Boeing UK, catering providers, airport workers, and so many more contributors. Not only will it save jobs it will ensure UK PLC continues to project around the world, which is more important now than it has ever been for when we recover from impact of Covid and promote ourselves after leaving the European Union.
attributes.background: Give consideration to financial assistance to aviation companies such as Virgin Atlantic, EasyJet, Loganair, and Britsh Airways etc. Save thousands of jobs, prevent a hit to the labour market and maintain our global position as a place for business.
